name: Defeat a boss without taking damage
Defeat every boss with Rogue's Ultimatum
Defeat at least 2 bosses with Rogue's Ultimatum
Obtain the Stone of the Recreant
Complete a run with one hex
Pay Tus at least half your gold
Have at least 10 unique curses at once
Defeat at least one boss with Rogue's Ultimatum
Kill a mimic before it wakes up
Clear a run drinking every potion you find immediately
Defeat a boss in under 40 seconds
